item.title: On Product Requirement Documentation
item.description: On Writing Product Documentation If there is already a backlog of issues/bugs. The first should be to pick up the most pressing problems by talking to different stakeholders (Support/Sales/Marketing) and creating a priotization matrix ranking each issue based on the prioties assigned by different team. Drop-offs during Onboarding | Marketing | Defining The Problem: Conversion sucks. 18% but should be able to do 30% (need source). What else have we tried here, and why is this worth trying?
